sentiment_analysis.summary: The customer, Javier, is frustrated with the sequencing feature he purchased from PC Recruiter, as he is not able to use it effectively and is unsure about the pricing. The agent, Jim, tries to clarify the customer's package and offers to provide additional training, but the customer is uncertain about what questions to ask.

call_resolution.problem_statement: The customer, Javier, is having issues with the sequencing feature in the PC Recruiter tool that he purchased. He is frustrated because he feels he is not getting the full value from the tool and is unsure how to properly use the sequencing functionality that was included in his package.
call_resolution.resolution_details: The employee, Jim, was able to confirm that Javier does have access to the sequencing feature as part of his package. However, Javier is still unclear on how to properly use the sequencing and is not getting the expected results. Jim offered to have one of the team members provide additional training and support to help Javier better understand and utilize the sequencing functionality.

follow_up.details: Jim will have one of the team members reach out to Javier to provide additional training and support on the sequencing feature.

missed_best_practices: Confirm customer's full understanding of the solution
Provide a more detailed explanation of the sequencing feature and how to use it effectively
improvement_suggestions: Schedule a follow-up call with the customer to ensure the training and support provided is effective and the customer is able to use the sequencing feature as expected
Offer to provide additional resources or documentation to help the customer better understand the sequencing functionality
